Package dev.jeka.core.api.java.project

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JkJavaIdeSupport.JkSupplier  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JkCompileLayout<T>
    Folder layout for a project output.
    JkJavaIdeSupport
    Minimal information necessary to generate metadata project file for IDE.
    JkJavaProject
    A Java project consists in 3 parts : JkJavaProjectConstruction : responsible to compile, tests and make jars JkJavaProjectDocumentation : responsible to creates javadoc, sources jar and others JkJavaProjectPublication : responsible to publish the artifacts on binary repositories (Maven or Ivy) Each of these parts are optional.
    JkJavaProjectCompilation<T>
    Handles project compilation step.
    JkJavaProjectConstruction
    Responsible to produce jar files.
    JkJavaProjectDocumentation
    Responsible to create Javadoc and Source jar.
    JkJavaProjectPublication
    Responsible to publish artifacts on the repository.
    JkJavaProjectSimpleFacade
    Simple facade over JkJavaProject to access common setting conveniently.
    JkJavaProjectTesting
    Handles project testing step.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    JkCompileLayout.Concern
